name: Gramps Fflowerr
description: Gramps Fflowerr by Om Chim /// 2021 /// Digital Art /// My gramps and his fflowerr. It is what makes him happy. He said that it reminds him of his love of his life which sadly they didn't get together til the end. Til this present day, he still nurtures and loves his fflowerr like no other. He is still holding on.
